title: 659: BITCOIN BULL TOM LEE STILL SEES $100K BTC BY YEAR-END, SAYS VOLATILITY IS ITS OPPORTUNITY!!!!!
description:
Wall Street strategist Tom Lee told CNBC on Monday that last week’s Bitcoin collapse has not shaken his bullish resolve, saying he’s standing by his $100,000 per BTC year-end price target.

“I think bitcoin is hyper-volatile. That’s the nature of it, but that’s what creates the reward for people,” Lee said in an interview on “TechCheck.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YouTube channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
